message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.Distributed, cs.PF 

The paper discusses the use of container technologies for scientific workloads in cloud-based environments, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses the mapping of containers with InfiniBand hardware, which falls under the category of Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the use of container-ready orchestration tools for resource management, which falls under the category of Software Engineering (cs.SE). Additionally, the paper discusses the performance evaluation of container technologies, which falls under the category of Performance (cs.PF). Overall, the paper covers a range of topics that could fit into multiple sub-categories, but the most likely ones are cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.Distributed, and cs.PF.
